National Park Girls - Episode 2: Happy Trails

name: National Park Girls: Episode 2 - Happy Trails
summary: National Park Girls - Episode 2: Happy Trails is the second installment in the episodic visual novel National Park Girls. Join park ranger Eve Aadams as she goes on a (reluctant) hike with Yellowstone, learns more about the girls' origins, and causes the end of western civilization!
